page1.title: Cooperative Understanding
page1.p1: Before the game begins, you need to understand some rules:
page1.p2: i. The issue of the application is based solely on the submission;
page1.p3: ii. You can make an offer on the submission according to your own criteria;
page1.p4: iii. If the offer deviates too far from the community consensus, the submitted PR may not be accepted.
page1.p5: Now, there are three people in front of you, and you have all done the same thing, and the other two have given their offers.
page1.p6: Okay, now it's your turn, how much are you going to offer...

page2.title: Next, you will have a round of voting...
page2.p1: At the beginning, Greedy Ghost voted first...
page2.p2: Next, the honest man cast his vote too...
page2.p3: Okay, now it's just you, who are you going to vote for?

page3.title: The result of your vote is...
page3.tips: * When the ei value is less than 0.8, the contribution size is automatically halved.
page3.prompt: All votes above are anonymous, and will be confirmed on the chain.
